data.name: CBS: Desolation
data.detailed_description:
Build, defend your sanctum, gather resources and survive in this post apocalyptic simulated survivor.

Features:

  • Build your sanctum from scratch, start with little water and other resources
  • Gather resources, run scouting and otherwise expeditions to nearing zones
  • Build, upgrade your shelter, house migrating survivors of the disasters
  • Build an inventory, upgrade and enhance your population with crafted items
  • Select one of 4 paragon types, bringing bonuses to your settlement
  • House select paragons to further upgrade your settlement and enhance your population for further success
  • Perform and defend raids in simulated single-player environment
  • Perform other encounters and trade with nearing settlements
  • Play through a refined story that composes your own settlement
  • Skirmish through your best settlement possible by the 100th day.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 746 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game uses 9:10 aspect ratio so an hd screen is necessary while most recent systems will be able to carry the entire game.

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Additional Notes: Game uses 9:10 aspect ratio so an hd screen is necessary while most recent systems will be able to carry the entire game.
